What I’m doing now

Primary Work

Talk. Art. Therapy.

Individual counselling sessions combining conversation, art, and contemplation.

Book a Session →

Social Meditation

Free online group meditation, Monday–Thursday 6:30am AEST.

Join Next Session →

Current Explorations

AI & Privacy in Therapeutic Work — Deep in the technical weeds of large language models, thinking about how to build secure, on-device AI systems for psychologists. Learning to code as I go, experimenting with Claude Code and local LLMs.

Grief Resources — Building a grief zine with prompts for writing to the lost one, planting seeds in their memory. Tangible tools people can hold and work with.

Personal Practice — Dancing regularly (Contact Improvisation, 5Rhythms). Listening to my old MP3 library album by album—more intentional than streaming’s endless scroll.

Last updated: Spring 2025
